skits.presenter: I have a high fever. 🌡️ Who should I see?
skits.responseCorrect: Correct! You should see a doctor 👩🏻‍⚕️ to get treated for your fever.
skits.responseIncorrect: Oh no! A dentist 🦷 can't help with a fever. Try again!

skits.presenter: I feel really nauseous. What should I take?
skits.responseCorrect: Yes! Taking medicine 💊 might help with nausea.
skits.responseIncorrect: Nope! Candy 🍬 won't help with nausea. Try again!

skits.presenter: I broke my arm! 🦴 Where should I go?
skits.responseCorrect: Correct! You should go to the hospital 🏥 to get it treated.
skits.responseIncorrect: Oops! Staying home 🏡 won't fix a broken arm. Try again!

skits.presenter: I don't feel well, and I need a tissue for my nose. 👃 What's wrong with me?
skits.responseCorrect: You're right! I'm sneezing 🤧 so I need a tissue!
skits.responseIncorrect: Not quite! I don't feel cold, 🥶 but I can't stop sneezing. 🤧

skits.presenter: I'm pregnant. 🤰 Who should I visit regularly?
skits.responseCorrect: Correct! You should visit a doctor 👩🏻‍⚕️ regularly during pregnancy.
skits.responseIncorrect: Oh no! A firefighter 👨🏻‍🚒 isn't the right choice. Try again!

skits.presenter: I have a headache. 🤕 What should I use?
skits.responseCorrect: Yes! Medicine 💊 can help with a headache.
skits.responseIncorrect: Nope! A cap 🧢 won't help with a headache. Try again!

skits.presenter: I have a cough. 🤧 What should I wear?
skits.responseCorrect: Correct! I can wear a mask 😷 when I have a cough.
skits.responseIncorrect: Not quite! Sunglasses 🕶 are not the right choice if I have a cough. Try again!

skits.presenter: I have a sore throat. 🦠 What should I drink?
skits.responseCorrect: Yes! Hot tea 🍵 can help soothe a sore throat.
skits.responseIncorrect: No! A cold soda 🥤 isn't helpful for a sore throat.

skits.presenter: I want to stay healthy. 💪 What should I eat more of?
skits.responseCorrect: Great choice! Eating salads 🥗 is good for health.
skits.responseIncorrect: Not quite! Eating cake 🍰 won't help you stay healthy.

skits.presenter: Ouch, I got a cut on my hand! 🖐🏽 What should I use?
skits.responseCorrect: Correct! A bandage 🩹 will help protect the cut.
skits.responseIncorrect: Nope! Candy 🍬 won't help with a cut. Try again!

skits.presenter: I'm allergic to dust. 🌬️ What should I use to prevent sneezing?
skits.responseCorrect: Correct! Using a mask 😷 can help prevent sneezing.
skits.responseIncorrect: Not quite! Soap 🧼 won't protect you from the dust. 🌬️ Try again!

skits.presenter: I need a health check-up. 🩺 Who should I visit?
skits.responseCorrect: Yes! You should visit a doctor 👩🏻‍⚕️ for a check-up.
skits.responseIncorrect: Oops! A chef 👨🏻‍🍳 isn't qualified to give you a check-up. Try again!

skits.presenter: I have a toothache. 🫢 Who should I see?
skits.responseCorrect: Correct! You should see a dentist 🦷 for a toothache.
skits.responseIncorrect: Nope! A doctor 👩🏻‍⚕️ isn't specialized for teeth. Try again!

skits.presenter: I want to donate blood. 🩸 Where should I go?
skits.responseCorrect: Yes! You should go to the hospital 🏥 to donate blood. 🩸
skits.responseIncorrect: No way! Donating at home 🏡 isn't safe. Try again!

skits.presenter: I injured my foot, 🦶 but I still want to walk. 🚶🏿‍♂️ What should I use to help me walk?
skits.responseCorrect: Great! Using crutches 🩼 can help me walk. 🚶🏿‍♂️
skits.responseIncorrect: Not quite! If I still want to walk, 🚶🏿‍♂️ I shouldn't use a wheelchair. 🦽

skits.presenter: I need to get my heart 🫀 checked. What should I get to check inside my chest?
skits.responseCorrect: Correct! An X-ray 🩻 will show inside the chest.
skits.responseIncorrect: Oops! A microscope 🔬 can't be used to check your chest. Try again!

skits.presenter: I scraped my knee. 🦵 What should I put to cover it up?
skits.responseCorrect: Yes! A bandage 🩹 will help protect the scrape.
skits.responseIncorrect: No! Soap 🧼 isn't helpful to cover up scrapes.

skits.presenter: I feel dizzy. 🌀 Where should I lie down?
skits.responseCorrect: Correct! You should lie down on a bed 🛏️ if you feel dizzy. 🌀
skits.responseIncorrect: Oops! You'd better not stay at the beach 🏖 if you feel dizzy. 🌀

skits.presenter: I feel like throwing up. 🤢 What should I avoid eating?
skits.responseCorrect: Yes! Avoid heavy meals like hamburgers 🍔 when feeling sick.
skits.responseIncorrect: Not quite! Soup 🍲 might actually help.

skits.presenter: I've got diarrhea. 🦠 What do I need?
skits.responseCorrect: Correct! I need to get to the toilet 🚽 right away.
skits.responseIncorrect: Nope! The sink 🚰 isn't what I need. At least I'm in the right room though!
